title: How Rookies Can Adapt With No Preseason
itunes:title: How Rookies Can Adapt With No Preseason
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys react to the news of how often the NFL will be testing players due to the pandemic (1:33). Next, the duo look at how rookies will adapt with no preseason and other adjustments that players and teams will have to make without a preseason (4:55). After that, the pair discuss the challenges of preparing for a team with new pieces and also talk about why teams that could trade future picks for players (14:14). To wrap up the show, DJ and Bucky explain how this unique season could impact the future of coaches that could be on the hot seat (22:03).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
